content: Is there anything more that should be done for #18568 (this is one of the PR's on Pell's equation)? @Eric Wieser
:ping_pong: Maybe this can be merged now? Then I could continue with implementing the theory of Pell's equation...
I'd prefer if another maintainer could take a final look; I have no further comments
There is one last comment to take into account, I've delegated it.

I've moved the zsqrtd-related lemmas to number_theory.zsqrtd.basic. I kept is_pell_solution_iff_mem_unitary in the pell file, though (and put it in the pell namespace, since it is more specific to Pell's equation). I made the simplification suggested by the "last comment". It is now being merged. Thanks to everybody!
